most_common.name: Twin Bed
most_common.description: Narrow bed for one person, commonly used in children's rooms, dorms, and shared spaces.

most_common.name: Twin XL Bed
most_common.description: Twin-width bed with extra length, especially common in college dormitories for taller sleepers.

most_common.name: Full Bed
most_common.description: Medium-width bed for one person or two closely, common in apartments and guest rooms.

most_common.name: Queen Bed
most_common.description: Most popular adult bed size, offering good space for couples without requiring a huge bedroom.

most_common.name: King Bed
most_common.description: Extra-wide bed giving couples maximum personal sleeping space.

most_common.name: California King Bed
most_common.description: Longer but slightly narrower than a standard king, designed for tall sleepers.

space_saving_and_shared.name: Bunk Bed
space_saving_and_shared.description: Two beds stacked vertically, commonly used in children's rooms, dorms, and shared bedrooms to save space.

space_saving_and_shared.name: Loft Bed
space_saving_and_shared.description: Elevated bed with open space underneath for a desk, storage, or seating area. Popular in dorms and small apartments.

space_saving_and_shared.name: Trundle Bed
space_saving_and_shared.description: Low bed on wheels that slides under another bed, ideal for sleepovers and guest rooms.

sofa_and_convertible.name: Sofa Bed
sofa_and_convertible.description: Couch that converts into a bed, commonly used in living rooms or small apartments.

sofa_and_convertible.name: Futon
sofa_and_convertible.description: Foldable mattress and frame functioning as both a couch and a bed.

sofa_and_convertible.name: Daybed
sofa_and_convertible.description: Bed styled like a couch, used for lounging during the day and sleeping at night.

portable_and_temporary.name: Air Mattress
portable_and_temporary.description: Inflatable mattress used for guests, camping, or temporary sleeping arrangements.

portable_and_temporary.name: Rollaway Bed
portable_and_temporary.description: Foldable wheeled bed commonly used in hotels for extra guests.
